class.name: arachnida/Hello_World
class.description: This is a sample nodelet to be used as a reference point for development.

class.name: arachnida/FLOAMNodelet
class.description: This nodelet receives a point cloud, goes brrrr on some least squares optimisation, and then spits out the translational and rotational transform between the current frame and previous frame of pointcloud data

class.name: arachnida/ObjectDetectionNodelet
class.description: This nodelet receives a point cloud, goes [INSERT MACHINE NOISES] on some RANSAC and euclidean optimisation, and spits out a bunch of detected objects (clusters of points).

class.name: arachnida/PathPlanningNodelet
class.description: This nodelet doesn't actually do anything.

class.name: arachnida/RobotStateNodelet
class.description: This nodelet uses data from F-LOAM to keep track of the robot's location.
